articles.title: Would you use Copilot AI in your Xbox games? - TrueAchievements
articles.description: This week, Microsoft announced that Copilot AI tech is coming to PC and Xbox games. For this week's poll, we want to know: would you use Copilot AI in your Xbox games?

articles.author: Madhumita Murgia, Stephen Morris
articles.title: Google's AI search tool tells users to 'eat rocks' - Financial Times
articles.description: ‘Hallucinations’ in new feature provoke ridicule and raise questions about betting core business on an experimental product
articles.content: Googles new artificial intelligence search tool has advised users that eating rocks can be healthy and to glue cheese to pizza, prompting ridicule and raising questions about its decision to embed an… [+4074 chars]

articles.author: Victoria Kennedy
articles.title: Helldivers 2 sees huge drop in player numbers since release - Eurogamer
articles.description: Helldivers 2 player numbers are on the decline.
articles.content:
Arrowhead's chaotic alien-shooter Helldivers 2 became PlayStation's fastest-selling game ever, but despite its initial success, player numbers have since declined.
A look at the game's Steam charts … [+4270 chars]
